contentList.content: Plagued by endless, horrifying nightmares. To remove this condition, open your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">eyes</LSTag>.
Affected entity can immediately use a bonus action to cast a powerful spell.

A highly important member of the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CCSTATUS_SHAR">Sharran</LSTag> church have gifted you Shar's Blessing. You are immune to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DivineIntervention_Shar_Target">Shar's Divine Intervention</LSTag>.
Tendrils of shadow engulf the corpse, until it becomes unclear where the body ends and the shadows begin.
This entity carries the essence of shadow, spreading its darkness wherever it treads. Its presence corrupts the light, leaving trails of gloom and despair in its wake.

This entity has ventured too close to the essence of shadow. Soon, it will become nothing more than an <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SCL_SHADOW_CURSE_UNDEAD_NEW">Undead</LSTag> thrall, bound to the Dark Lady’s will.
There is nothing here. Whatever you pointed at no longer exists.
There is nothing here. Whatever you pointed at no longer exists.

You can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DivineIntervention_Shar_Target">Divine Intervention: Shar</LSTag> to invoke <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CCSTATUS_SHAR">Shar</LSTag>'s aid. Once used, this can never be used again.

A highly important member of the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CCSTATUS_SHAR">Sharran</LSTag> church have gifted you Shar's Blessing. You are immune to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_DivineIntervention_Shar_Target">Shar's Divine Intervention</LSTag>.
A shadowy manifestation of Lady <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CCSTATUS_SHAR">Shar</LSTag>, the Nightsinger, cloaked in eternal darkness.

The shadow unleashes a wave of terror through the darkness, trapping obscured creatures in a nightmare of despair. All obscured targets take [1] and become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> for 3 turns.

Unable to escape this torment, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag> targets are afflicted by <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHADOWFIEND_NIGHTMARE_STATUS">Endless Nightmare</LSTag> until they can see the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CCSTATUS_SELUNE">light</LSTag> again.
Call upon the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CCSTATUS_SHAR">Nightbringer</LSTag> to deliver a divine reckoning unto your foes. Only faithful Sharrans will be spared.
Beware, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_DivineIntervention">Shar's intervention</LSTag> often brings widespread death and devastation. The consequences of invoking her power can be catastrophic.
Bestow the blessing of Lady <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CCSTATUS_SHAR">Shar</LSTag> upon your allies. Blessed creatures are shielded from Shar's destructive power.
You can also use this to cure a <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SCL_SHADOW_CURSE_UNDEAD">Shadow-Cursed Undead</LSTag> or to heal <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS_DEVOURDREAMS">Madness</LSTag>.

Call upon Shar’s ultimate power to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DEAD_SHAR">Erase</LSTag> a creature from existence. The target is slain instantly, and from its remains rises a shadow infused with chaos, attacking all in its path without mercy.
Cause <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SHADOW_CURSED_VINES">Shadow-Cursed Vines</LSTag> surfaces to vanish.
A high-ranking member of the Sharran church has granted you their blessing. You will not suffer harm should your ally decide to call upon the force of their god.

As the greater deity of darkness, Shar is feared for her power over the night, secrets, and loss. She is locked in eternal conflict with her twin sister <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CCSTATUS_SELUNE">Selûne</LSTag>, goddess of the moon.

The Lady of Silver presides over the moon, stars, and navigation. Her power over the heavens is constantly challenged by her sister <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CCSTATUS_SHAR">Shar</LSTag>, who seeks to plunge the world into eternal shadow.
Sculpt a massive sphere of entropic energy around a creature. Devastate the target and all surrounding creatures.
A statue of Selûne, Our Lady of Silver, the Moonmaiden, gazing quietly at the world.
This character hold an item infused with Shar's unholy magic.

This journal is scorched around the edges, its cover marred by deep gashes and smeared with dried blood. Several pages are missing, and the remaining ones are brittle and stained, as if they had been submerged in shadows and suffering.

[Though most of the pages are illegible, you discern what appears to be an expedition journal. One paragraph catches your eye.]

...suspects nothing. Mother V. was clear: the mission entrusted to me, and me alone, must remain absolutely secret. But the giths have taken us far off the route to Elturel, and reaching the Chiontar would take days — not to mention that I’d have to explain to the others why I’m leading them away from Baldur's Gate... Giths, ogres, a DRAGON, and what next? An owlbear??

[As you flip through the rest of the pages, most of them torn or charred, another paragraph catches your attention.]

I have failed. We are two days from the Gate, and still no sign of that damned sanctuary. And honestly, what could she possibly want with a pile of ruins cursed by the traitor Selûne anyway? It doesn’t matter anymore. My mission is a failure, and I must now pay the price. All this for what? For HER? I don’t understand why she matters so much to her. She’s not even a real Sharran, that much is obvious. She reeks of life and spends her time lighting up everything with her unholy magic. Sure, the healing is appreciated, but potions would work just as well. Mistress of the Night, forgive me for this affront...


[As you close the journal, a note slips into your hands. The fine and delicate handwriting contrasts sharply with that of the journal, and the paper seems far older. Though in very poor condition, you manage to decipher what seems to be a psalm.]

From lies and despair, raise death.
Life is an illusion, but shadows can’t be deceived.
Through desperation and darkness, one may attain a holy state.
Oblivion.
None can outrun the fate of the forsaken.
Use the power of your Oath to gain control over an undead creature. The undead will follow you around and attack your enemies.
Force a shadow or undead creature to bend to your will. It will follow you and attack your enemies.
A statue of Selûne, Our Lady of Silver, the Moonmaiden, gazing quietly at the world.
Call down a beam of light at the targeted location. Target must be within [1].
Call down a beam of light that damages any creature that enters the beam or starts its turn in the light. You can use an action to move the beam [1].
A beam of Light radiate this object.
This item is infused with holy Light.
This item radiate a pleaseant light.
A beam of pure nothingness hurtles toward the object.
Chose a present to be gifted.
Call down a beam of void at the targeted location. Target must be within [1].
You can't shake the feeling that darkness seeps out of this heavy, orb-like stone.
This item is infused with holy Nothingness.

What is Darkness if Light doesn't exists ?
One can't be without even.
Find Ilyn Toth
You can't shake the feeling that darkness seeps out of this heavy, orb-like stone.
Dissolve into the ground and emerge from the shadows at a different location.
